```{r, eval=TRUE}
setwd("/Users/austinsechrest/Documents/Github/LISH-AFL-Project/")
library(readxl)
afl<-read_excel("afl_games.xlsx")
```

```{r, eval=TRUE}
nmfc <- afl[afl$Home=="North Melbourne",]
geelong <- afl[afl$Home=="Geelong",]
nmfc_home_away <- afl[afl$Home=="North Melbourne" | afl$Away=="North Melbourne",]
geelong_home_away <- afl[afl$Home=="Geelong" | afl$Away=="Geelong",]
write.csv(nmfc, "nmfc.csv")
write.csv(nmfc_home_away, "nmfc_home_away.csv")
write.csv(geelong, "geelong.csv")
write.csv(geelong_home_away, "geelong_home_away.csv")
```
